Do you want American or British English? Distinctively AmE spellings in this article are 'woolen' (more than once), 'center' (more than once), 'labeling' (p. 107). Distinctively BrE are 'analyse' and very many words in 'ise', 'isation' etc. (while you have plenty of 'ize' forms too at the moment).  If you want AmE, you will need to change these all to 'ize' forms. In fact, 'ize' is perfectly good in BrE style too.
